name: The Explors: Pyramid Explorers
description:
Exploro & Explora - siblings hailing from the Explor family - have come across a pyramid on their hunt for treasure. But this pyramid holds a magical secret: the interior layout changes each time the pyramid is entered! As if that weren't enough, the pyramid also houses a plethora of ferocious monsters! But Exploro & Explora aren't afraid. The Explors always complete their treasure hunt, no matter what challenges lie in their way!

Features

  • Old-fashioned arcade action, complete with high score leaderboards!
  • Choose an Explor and hunt solo, or pair up with a friend in co-op mode!
  • 4 enemy types and 3 boss types, each having multiple attack variations!
  • Randomly-generated floor layouts make each treasure hunt feel unique!
